detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the leds
led
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the led
led
pointer to a led object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a led objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new led
copy
pointer to a led object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created led

Set the brightness of a LED object
led
pointer to a LED object
bright
0 (max. dark) ... 255 (max. light)

Light on a LED
led
pointer to a LED object

Light off a LED
led
pointer to a LED object

Toggle the state of a LED
led
pointer to a LED object

Get the brightness of a LEd object
led
pointer to LED object
bright 0 (max. dark) ... 255 (max. light)
